# Yawncat Web Project Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a web application project for Yawncat. The codebase is currently empty, so these instructions will be updated as the project develops.

## Architecture
- Frontend: To be determined (e.g., React, Vue, or vanilla JS)
- Backend: To be determined (e.g., Node.js, Python, or serverless)
- Database: To be determined

## Coding Conventions
- Use modern JavaScript/TypeScript
- Follow standard naming conventions (camelCase for variables, PascalCase for components)
- Write descriptive commit messages

## Workflows
- No build or test scripts established yet
- Use Git for version control

## Dependencies
- No external dependencies added yet

## Integration Points
- None established

This file will be refined as the codebase grows.
